body: Yeah this series really lost all the charm it had in the first chapter, and this chapters is a serious unnecessary part, whatever
@Wincest Pretty much, especially since both of them still end up together (noticed it in the Japanese tankoubon) 👌
Was this really necessary?
@Ravenleaf  So much butthurt...
I came here to fap... now I'm just pissed.
The kid is a Cuck!  That is what they are getting at.

I think its more of a mental thing why she couldn't come with three guys that were bigger than her son.
She is just way too turned on when shes thinking about him, so naturally there is more excitment and stimulation.
It sums it up to that really.

I don't really get everyone's issues here. 1) is this really even cheating? she straight up said what she was going to do and why 2) there realtionship was weird in the first place, the son even gets that and realizes he can't say anything. 3) She still loves and adores him the best, if anything, she affirmed this made her feelings even stronger for him. I can understand not really liking her unilateral decision to be with others, but there is really no solid argument to stop her from it. Ultimately, he is still with her, she is still happy with him and it all works out, and likewise in the future its not like she can stop him from "learning" either
Well, at least the reason she did that is to study. lol
Chapter 3 not 2.
At the very least it isn't NTR so that's something
wtf i thought this series is vanilla. fck im not gonna read this chapter. i will stop with chapter 2.
really hope there is more of this
